caption.title: Genomic structure of LsST6.
caption.p: (A) LsST6 consisted of 5′UTR (blue), ORF (green) and 3′UTR (yellow). (B) Base sequence of LsST6 had high identity with NlST6 from the brown planthopper ( Nilaparvata lugens). Sequences of LsST6 and NlST6 were aligned using ClustalX2 software.
Click here for additional data file.
